column4: anyone up for helping with the god awful problem of gutsy + compiz + update = no window borders
I've heard that problem before, the guy on the forum said he liked no borders :)
haha, well it switches every other day it seems- one day i have none, the next I have fully transparent ones, but in the end i just keep reverting to metacity --replace
well, I haven't experimented that much - I use an OSX theme on metacity (and it rocks)
